Title: Minority Report
Overview: John Anderton is a top 'Precrime' cop in the late-21st century, when technology can predict crimes before they're committed. But Anderton becomes the quarry when another investigator targets him for a murder charge.
Tagline: The system is perfect until it comes after you.
Keywords: self-fulfilling prophecy, washington d.c., evidence, future, hologram, dystopia, murder, neo-noir, future noir
production_companies: DreamWorks SKG, Cruise/Wagner Productions, Amblin Entertainment, Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation, Blue Tulip Productions, Ronald Shusett/Gary Goldman, Digital Image Associates
Cast: Tom Cruise, Colin Farrell, Samantha Morton
